From now on we will pay with Minecraft minecoins on PC

Minecraft Minecoins are an in-game payment method that you can use to purchase skins, texture packs, worlds, and in-game content through the Minecraft Marketplace. If you don’t have the time or experience to create complex skins or textures, you can let other Minecrafters do it for you. This way you can put all your time and energy into your main project. Don’t forget to browse the Minecraft Marketplace from time to time, you might get some good ideas for yourself to use.

On which platforms do the Minecoins from the marketplace work?

Before entering the wonderful world of blocks, it might be a good idea to know which platforms you can spend the shiny minecoins on. Some platforms don’t have a Minecraft Marketplace, so be careful with that.

Minecraft minecoins have a specific value

You might be wondering how much that is, but that’s entirely up to the mine sellers. The more time and energy put into creating certain cool content, the more value it will receive. Of course, popularity is also a factor, the more demand, the higher the price. Be smart when spending your minecoins and check out the Minecraft Marketplace, you might get some good ideas for your main project.

Use Minecraft Minecoins to get more Minecoins

If you have a businessman’s mind, there are ways for creative people to get more minecoins. Browse the market square and see where people flock to. If certain content is popular, try to use that content and create something new or improve it. This way you can resell it on the marketplace and earn some Minecoins.
